mean_cn: adj.教条主义的，空谈理论的
mean_en: used to describe a person who has very strong beliefs about what should be done and will not change them or accept other people\u0027s opinions
sentence: Avoiding doctrinaire thinking requires the combination of theory and practice.
sentence_trans: 避免教条主义思维的出现需要理论结合实践。
word_etyma: doctr教 ＋ in在...中 ＋ aire人 → 教条之人 → doctrinaire空谈家，教条的
